May 6, 2021
muel0017
3-0 thus far with this guy and going strong. There are alot of enhancers in this set so he usually does a minimum of 4 damage for me. His Mystics and Free attack abilities are very niche and don't get used often in real play but his base stats and abilities + nice point cost make him very playable. Great piece!
April 15, 2021
Decoder
Finally have a new Gambit that can replace my wolverine and the x men version.. Gambit is definitely my favorite original x men. Not my favorite x men in a whole however. Is a little Op for 80pts however.. should been at least 100pts. Time to deal the cards mol cher ri
